name: Zombeat (itch)
description:
Zombeat is a simple platformer where you collect the lyrics and song layers of those that came before you. When you die, you get to leave some lyrics and a layer behind. Make it to the top of the level to drop off your song at the big skull boombox and add it to the database!

Controls:

  • A / D  or Arrows to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Shift to run
  • F or sometimes Enter to confirm stuff
  • Press ESC to go back to the song menu
